column4: Hello. How do i add this to my ppa? https://launchpad.net/~jstrunk-math/+archive/ppa
thx. How can i then install netatalk 2.2.1 from that source instead of the normal netatalk in the normal repo?
but tab completion only shows netatalk and not netatalk 2.2.1
and see the version, repository, all the info about the package
that only gives me this: netatalk - AppleTalk user binaries
but looks like its using 2.2.1 then tight?
yeah ok ...i did that...how can i check the version of the just installed netatalk then...just to make sure?
not sure how netatalk works, but it's usually -version or --version
the packet manager cannot show me?
it has already done, "apt-cache show netatalk"
whatever it shows you is installed
